DOC.brief_summary: This randomize , double-blind , placebo- active-controlled , parallel group study evaluate safety efficacy RO4917838 ( bitopertin ) patient acute exacerbation schizophrenia . Patients randomize receive either RO4917838 10 mg RO4917838 30 mg olanzapine 15 mg placebo orally daily 4 week inpatient , 4-week follow-up period .
